name: Rómulo Gallegos
description: Venezuelan novelist, politician, and educator, first democratically elected president of Venezuela and author of the Latin American literary classic Doña Bárbara
philosophy: Literature must be a reflection of our reality, a mirror of our struggles and aspirations as a people.
quotes: The land is like a woman: it must be loved with respect
Democracy is not a privilege, it is a responsibility
Education is the foundation of all social progress
